attributes.title: THE WORST APP ON THE APP STORE!!
attributes.review: I was going through the app and all of a sudden my hamster started wailing, it proceeded to do so until I left this hateful app. I then went outside and away from my hamster to try and use the app again, and as soon as I re-opened it all of the birds within a 100 mile radius from where I sat just fell from the sky completely paralyzed! Can you believe that because I can‚Äôt. Anyways this app is no good and I do not recommend it to anyone... not even my worst enemies.

attributes.title: Do not get this app!!
attributes.review: By far the worst app I have ever downloaded. I‚Äôm usually not very harsh if an app is slower and not very well put together, but this was ridiculous. It took 83 hours to load plus it took up all the storage on my phone. It might as well be deleted at this point with all of the problems!! On top of being so slow, it also made my power go out and stole all the televisions in my home. Trust me this app is not even worth any of your time.

attributes.title: This app is UNACCEPTABLE!!!

attributes.title: Do not download this app!!
attributes.review: I downloaded this app thinking i could get updates on the 2020 election and campaign. However, the app was packed full of ads and i could hardly navigate and thing on. it also made the rest of my phone run very slow. things would take forever to load and would ruin the quality of anything i was looking at. i would definitely advise anyone to never download this app or your phone will be ruined!
